messages.message:
PSA: next time you pull the latest master & restart all services, you'll likely see this error `error loading organizations`
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CSY11CK7T/p1749759849314459
Please fix it by:
1. Run post-install action `aihub-license`:
```cd tools/onprem/post-install-action-aihub-license
make build-docker
make run-docker```
You should see logs like "Populating prebuilt roles and role actions". At this point, the roles table should be filled with data
 2.  Run db migration:
```cd $IB_HOME/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db
export DB_PARAMS='--dialect=mysql --port=3306 --hostname=mysql --username=root --database=ibdb'
bazel run tools/dbmigrate```
At this point, the permissions table should be filled with data
